children.value: This event is now over. A big thank you to all the participants!
Let's draw together on city walls all over the world!
Lockdown measures brought all social and cultural activities to a halt. To tackle this we offer to share together a drawing session every Sunday evening.
and videoproject on a wall drawings made by you and your neigbors on their phones. You can draw with all other participants around the world and send your supportive messages.

properties.alt: Picture of a videoprojection on the 26th of April
properties.title: Picture of a videoprojection on the 26th of April

children.value: Participants are invited to draw freely on their phone without downloading an app:
They go on this website and access the drawing interface
They finger draw directly on their phone screen
They send their drawings. Drawings join the videoprojection instantly
Drawings travel between locations connecting people and creating a
collective artwork evolving with upcoming drawings

children.value: If you have a videoprojector you can join the movement. We are currently more than 25 volunteers across multiple cities. To join us, fill the form and we will reach you:
The form is no longer available
6 nights of video projections between April and May
Since the lockdown started we made more than

children.value: Find more pictures of this event on social networks:
Thank you to all the volunteers

Thank you Gilles, David, Alain, Yannick, Livia, Josselin, Aurélie, Romain, Aurélien, Marion, Harold, Yann, Anne, Théo, Julien, Vincent, Nicolas, Monsieur Nuage, Colin, Georges, Victor, Charles, Dorian, Corentin, Lilian, Francis, Emeric, Maxime, Maxime et Louis for joining this adventure!
Thank you to our partners and communication channels
Jean-Baptiste Wallers-Bulot, journalist and light expert. Discover his work on
All of you sharing this initiative across social medias
All pictures on this website are royalty free.
